dc:title: We Are Un-American: We Are Catholics
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Passionate condemnation of UMT (Universal Military Training) as un-Catholic and atheistic. Advocates Catholics become conscientious objectors. Condemns Americanism and rabid anti-Communism.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 466 1948-04-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
